category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Problem_Solving_Report_Name_Format
preference.preference_description: Report Name generate pattern. Valid patterns can be KEY_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS. KEY=$USER, if used for Current Logged in User name. KEY=any_string, If used it will be taken as prefix for the name of the report. YYYY= Current running year. DD=Current day of running month. MM=Current month of running year. HH=Current Hour. MM=Current number of minutes in hour. SS=Current seconds in minute. All other patterns are invalid to generate report name, if given in the preference default pattern will be taken.
